nodes.text: The Architect Droid AD was a model of humanoid-shaped battle droid produced by the Okara Droid Company at the Okara Droid Factory on Balmorra. A number of them were used to defend the factory during the Cold War.
Architect Droid ADs appear as enemies in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where they can be found inside the Okara Droid Factory on the Imperial version of Balmorra.
